org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema
Class AeSchemaUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema.AeSchemaUtil
public class AeSchemaUtil
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class that contains static methods used to manipulate XML schemas.

Method Detail

mergeSchemas

public static org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.Schema mergeSchemas(org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.Schema aSchema1,
                                                               org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.Schema aSchema2)
                                                        throws org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.SchemaException
This method merges all of the schema types, elements, namespaces, attribute groups, from the two passed in schemas into a single schema.

Parameters:
aSchema1 -
aSchema2 -
Throws:
org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.SchemaException
To do:
Alternatively, change the wsdl def object to hold a list of schemas rather than one schema per target namespace.

serializeSchema

public static java.lang.String serializeSchema(org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.Schema aSchema,
                                               boolean aUseIndentation)
Given a schema, returns a String which is the schema serialized as a string. This method is primarily a debugging tool - it should be used as the detail formatter for a Schema object in Eclipse. That is the reason for the extra formatting flag: the resulting text from the SchemaWriter is reparsed in order to re-serialize with indentation turned on.

Parameters:
aSchema - The schema to serialize
aUseIndentation - True if the result should be indented

getSubstitutionGroupLevel

public static int getSubstitutionGroupLevel(org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.ElementDecl aHeadElement,
                                            org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.ElementDecl aMemberElement)
Gets the substitution group level for specified group head and group member. For the memeber element donesnt belong the gorup, level = -1, If two elements belong to a gorup but in the same level, level = 0, If the member element is in the head element group, level = n, where n = 1, 2, 3...

Parameters:
aHeadElement -
aMemberElement -
Returns:
a substitution group level

isDataDerivedFromType

public static boolean isDataDerivedFromType(AeBPELExtendedWSDLDef aWsdlDef,
                                            javax.xml.namespace.QName aDataType,
                                            javax.xml.namespace.QName aBaseType)
Finds the passed data type derived from the passed base type

Parameters:
aWsdlDef - The wsdl def that should contain the type information
aDataType - The data type to determine
aBaseType - The base type which we want to know if the data type is derived from
Returns:
true if it is derived false otherwise
Throws:
AeException
